nodes.excerpt: Your own version of The Bachelor(ette). Every week, we'll feature bachelor(ette)s you can pitch a date to. We'll live stream some of the finalists. Even if you're not interested in dating one of our bachelor(ette)s, you can matchmake them for prizes.
nodes.title: Pitch a Date - Pitch a date to one of our bachelor(ette)s.
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 你自己版本的单身汉(ette)。每周，我们都会推出你可以投递约会对象的单身汉。我们会直播一些决赛选手。即使你没有兴趣和我们的单身汉约会，你也可以和他们做媒来获得奖品。
localize.tagline: 向我们的单身汉们推荐一个约会。

localize.description: 你自己版本的單身漢(ette)。每週，我們都會推出你可以投遞約會對象的單身漢。我們會直播一些決賽選手。即使你沒有興趣和我們的單身漢約會，你也可以和他們做媒來獲得獎品。
localize.tagline: 向我們的單身漢們推薦一個約會。

nodes.excerpt: Grow your business overnight, every night. Tech startups and newsletter publishers enjoy low-cost growth with our referral program software. - GrowSurf customers see 300-1000% returns and 9-40% monthly growth.
nodes.title: GrowSurf - Build a referral program into your product or newsletter
nodes.author: Kevin Yun

localize.description: 一夜之间，每晚都能增长你的业务。科技创业公司和通讯出版商通过我们的推荐计划软件享受低成本增长。- GrowSurf的客户看到300-1000%的回报和9-40%的月增长。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品或时事通讯中建立一个推荐计划。

localize.description: 一夜之間，每晚都能增長你的業務。科技創業公司和通訊出版商通過我們的推薦計劃軟件享受低成本增長。- GrowSurf的客戶看到300-1000%的回報和9-40%的月增長。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品或時事通訊中建立一個推薦計劃。

nodes.excerpt: Applysis is a data analytics tool, helping businesses owning mobile applications to analyse customer reviews efficiently, in a matter of minutes. With the help of AI we detect concrete problems and most requested features.
nodes.title: Applysis - Analyse mobile app reviews efficiently, in minutes.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Applysis是一款数据分析工具，帮助拥有移动应用的企业在几分钟内高效分析客户评价。在人工智能的帮助下，我们会发现具体的问题和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内高效分析移动应用的评论。

localize.description: Applysis是一款數據分析工具，幫助擁有移動應用的企業在幾分鐘內高效分析客戶評價。在人工智能的幫助下，我們會發現具體的問題和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內高效分析移動應用的評論。

nodes.excerpt: With LeafPile you can collect and organize your inspiration, thoughts, images, videos, and links in once place. It is simple, easy to use and best of all free!

localize.tagline: 可视化的书签，让你轻松实现。

nodes.excerpt: TextOptimizer is simple, fast, and efficient so that you can write well-optimized content in less than 10 minutes. 70% of our optimized pages ranked higher within 5 weeks.
nodes.title: Text Optimizer - Text optimization tool to rank higher in search engines
nodes.author: Sanjay Joshi

localize.description: TextOptimizer是简单、快速、高效的，所以你可以在10分钟内写出优化好的内容。我们70%的优化页面在5周内排名较高。

nodes.excerpt: Watch Something helps you find great movies or TV shows to watch on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime. But instead of recommending 1000 mediocre options, Watch Something provides 3 great, highly rated options (you can load more), based on the user preferred genre.
nodes.title: Watch Something - Discover what to watch on Netflix, Amazon and Hulu
nodes.author: Gal Vered

localize.description: Watch Something 帮助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上观看的优秀电影或电视节目。但是，Watch Something不是推荐1000个平庸的选项，而是根据用户喜欢的类型，提供3个伟大的、高评价的选项（你可以加载更多）。
localize.tagline: 发现在Netflix、亚马逊和Hulu上看什么？

localize.description: Watch Something 幫助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上觀看的優秀電影或電視節目。但是，Watch Something不是推薦1000個平庸的選項，而是根據用戶喜歡的類型，提供3個偉大的、高評價的選項（你可以加載更多）。
localize.tagline: 發現在Netflix、亞馬遜和Hulu上看什麼？

nodes.excerpt: We fixed the Clubhouse event links preview on social media 👋 ⠀ Copy-paste your event URL and we'll auto-generate image + share link ⠀ ✅ Real preview image ✅ Working “open in app” button ✅ Event analytics ⠀ We build it in our free time; all feedback welcome 🤙

localize.tagline: 社交媒體預覽和會所活動的登陸頁面。

nodes.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

nodes.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!

nodes.author: Farid Movsumov

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。

Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
